Text:
If you have a zero-seed issue, try grabbing a copy from here http://www.sladinki007.net/index.php?showtopic=33457  It has a single tracker (Sladinki), whereas this has TPB and Sladinki (I hope!).

M.
I can't thank you enough for this, I didn't even know it existed. Thank you, thank you and thank you.
Don't you just hate those registration-only sites?
There's a strange "skip" at 4:20 but only lasts a minute or so.
Thanks for this!  Been looking for ages, couldn't remember the name (extra thanks to Wikipedia......).  I'll seed for as long as I can
Also watch John Pilger documentaries. They are hard to endure but eye-opener, mind-blowing and the best medicine to brainwashing I encountered so far.

This is a masterpiece!

I've never seen such a well told story - especially from a scientific point of view. 
And the special effect are a state of art even nowadays.

However, I've noted at least 3 or 4 breakes and jams in the movie.
Do you have them too or it's only the problem of downloading?
